candidates.name: transaction_velocity_1h
candidates.rationale: Counts transactions in the past hour to detect rapid transaction patterns.

candidates.name: transaction_amt_mean_1d
candidates.rationale: Calculates the mean transaction amount over the past day to identify unusual spending.

candidates.name: transaction_amt_std_1d
candidates.rationale: Measures the standard deviation of transaction amounts over the past day to detect variability.

candidates.name: time_since_last_transaction
candidates.rationale: Calculates time since the last transaction to identify inactive periods.

candidates.name: card_usage_frequency
candidates.rationale: Determines how frequently a card is used, which can indicate potential fraud.

candidates.name: avg_transaction_amt_per_card
candidates.rationale: Calculates the average transaction amount per card to detect deviations.

candidates.name: transaction_amt_variance_per_card
candidates.rationale: Measures transaction amount variance per card to identify unusual spending patterns.

candidates.name: deviation_from_historical_mean
candidates.rationale: Calculates deviation from historical mean to detect anomalies.

candidates.name: unusual_time_window
candidates.rationale: Bins transactions into time windows to detect unusual activity times.

candidates.name: high_risk_merchant_combination
candidates.rationale: Encodes product codes to identify high-risk merchant combinations.

rationale: The plan focuses on creating features that capture transaction patterns, card usage behavior, and potential risk indicators without leaking target information, while respecting the time constraints and ensuring interpretability for tree-based models.
